name: DailyVerification
description: Entity representing daily verification records for soldiers

soldier_id.description: The ID of the soldier being verified.

verification_date.description: The specific date of the verification.

verified_by_user_id.description: The ID of the user who performed the verification.

verified_by_user_name.description: The full name of the user who performed the verification.

division_name.description: The division to which the soldier belongs at the time of verification.

comments.description: Optional comments if there are issues or notes.
